Template.SubjectPart: Welcome to OnWhichDate! Let's get started.
Template.TextPart:
Dear {{name}},
Welcome to OnWhichDate.com! Your login account is:
 {{email}} 
We have no passwords! Whenever you need to login, enter your email and click the magic link sent to you. This is secure, and you never have to store and remember a password for us.
To get started, head over to https://onwhichdate.com and add a few important documents to get started. We suggest:

passport
driving license
mobile phone subscription

Some more tips:

go to account to set some defaults, they'll save you time.
visit tips for some cool techniques that'll save you even more time!
check out our plans - they're amazingly affordable.
we're always listening; got suggestions or issues? go to support to submit them.

We hope to serve you years to come,
sincerely, 
team OWD!
Template.HtmlPart:
Dear {{name}},

Welcome to OnWhichDate.com! Your login account is:

{{email}}

We have no passwords! Whenever you need to login, enter your email and click the magic link sent to you. This is secure, and you never have to store and remember a password for us.

To get started, head over to https://onwhichdate.com and add a few important documents to get started. We suggest:

  1. passport
  2. driving license
  3. mobile phone subscription

Some more tips:

  1. go to account to set some defaults, they'll save you time.
  2. visit tips for some cool techniques that'll save you even more time!
  3. check out our plans - they're amazingly affordable.
  4. we're always listening; got suggestions or issues? go to support to submit them.

We hope to serve you years to come,

sincerely,

team OWD!
